Frequently Asked Questions

What is Intellisort? How does it work?

Intellisort is an AI-powered platform that analyzes your waste and provides efficient sorting and disposal solutions. Just input the type of waste or take a picture of it, and our AI will generate personalized disposal instructions for you!

Why should I use Intellisort?

Using Intellisort makes waste management effortless and eco-friendly. It helps you reduce waste, recycle efficiently, and make sustainable choices.

Is Intellisort easy to use?

Absolutely! Intellisort is designed to be user-friendly. Just enter the type of waste you have or snap a photo, and get instant, easy-to-follow sorting and disposal suggestions.

Is this AI a high school project?

Yes, Intellisort was developed as part of a high school initiative. We're proud of our student team for creating such a useful tool.

How does Intellisort contribute to the environment?

By using Intellisort, you ensure that waste is disposed of correctly, reducing landfill use and promoting recycling. This helps conserve resources and lower carbon footprints.

Is Intellisort available in multiple languages?

No, Intellisort does not support multiple languages, only English.
